Team killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as team-killer and you will get kicked.

1. Don't be a douchebag. If you have a problem with another player, take it to the streets and have a shootout.
2. dont be an idiot over VOIP. We will have a public TeamSpeak for players to use soon.
3. Team killing or stealing from team mates when you BLUFOR or OPFOR is forbidden and punishable. Play as Independent if you want to be free for all.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is strictly forbidden
5. Do not exploit or you will be banned and we will make fun of you behind your back.
6. have fun & watch out for the AI they are nasty little fuckers
